member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Cryptography.KeyDerivation.KeyDerivation
member.summary: Provides algorithms for performing key derivation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Cryptography.KeyDerivation.KeyDerivation.Pbkdf2(System.String,System.Byte[],Microsoft.AspNetCore.Cryptography.KeyDerivation.KeyDerivationPrf,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Performs key derivation using the PBKDF2 algorithm.
member.param: The password from which to derive the key.
The salt to be used during the key derivation process.
The pseudo-random function to be used in the key derivation process.
The number of iterations of the pseudo-random function to apply during the key derivation process.
The desired length (in bytes) of the derived key.
member.remarks: The PBKDF2 algorithm is specified in RFC 2898.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Cryptography.KeyDerivation.KeyDerivationPrf
member.summary: Specifies the PRF which should be used for the key derivation algorithm.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Cryptography.KeyDerivation.KeyDerivationPrf.HMACSHA1
member.summary: The HMAC algorithm (RFC 2104) using the SHA-1 hash function (FIPS 180-4).

member.name: F:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Cryptography.KeyDerivation.KeyDerivationPrf.HMACSHA256
member.summary: The HMAC algorithm (RFC 2104) using the SHA-256 hash function (FIPS 180-4).

member.name: F:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Cryptography.KeyDerivation.KeyDerivationPrf.HMACSHA512
member.summary: The HMAC algorithm (RFC 2104) using the SHA-512 hash function (FIPS 180-4).

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Cryptography.KeyDerivation.PBKDF2.IPbkdf2Provider
member.summary: Internal interface used for abstracting away the PBKDF2 implementation since the implementation is OS-specific.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Cryptography.KeyDerivation.PBKDF2.ManagedPbkdf2Provider
member.summary: A PBKDF2 provider which utilizes the managed hash algorithm classes as PRFs. This isn't the preferred provider since the implementation is slow, but it is provided as a fallback.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Cryptography.KeyDerivation.PBKDF2.Pbkdf2Util
member.summary: Internal base class used for abstracting away the PBKDF2 implementation since the implementation is OS-specific.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Cryptography.KeyDerivation.PBKDF2.Win7Pbkdf2Provider
member.summary: A PBKDF2 provider which utilizes the Win7 API BCryptDeriveKeyPBKDF2.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Cryptography.KeyDerivation.PBKDF2.Win8Pbkdf2Provider
member.summary: A PBKDF2 provider which utilizes the Win8 API BCryptKeyDerivation.
